00029 char **copy_lines (code_list_t *code)
00030 {
00031     /* copy code into array of pointer to char and return pointer to base of
00032        array
00033     */
00034    char **result;
00035    char text [TEXTLEN];
00036    int textptr = 0;
00037    int lines = 0;
00038    /* int num_code_nodes = 0; */
00039    char c, done = 0;
00040 
00041    /* printf ("copy_lines\n"); */
00042    clptr = code;
00043    codeptr = clptr->code;
00044    /* num_code_nodes =  */
00045    cn_count (code);
00046    code_lines = lines = list_line_count (code);
00047    code_lines++;
00048    result = (char **) calloc (lines + 1, sizeof (char *));
00049    lines = 0;
00050    while (!done)
00051    {
00052       /* codeptr = clptr->code; */
00053       textptr = 0;
00054       while ((c = next_char ()) != '\n' && c != END_OF_LIST)
00055       {
00056          if (c == 0)
00057             break;
00058          text [textptr] = c;
00059          textptr++;
00060          if (textptr > TEXTLEN)
00061          {
00062             fprintf (stderr, "line too long\n");
00063             return NULL;
00064          }
00065       }
00066       text [textptr] = 0;
00067       result [lines] = strdup (text);
00068       /*
00069       result [lines] = (char *) calloc (strlen (text) + 1, sizeof (char));
00070       strcpy (result [lines], text);
00071       */
00072 
00073       lines++;
00074       if (c == END_OF_LIST)
00075          done = 1;
00076    }
00077 
00078    code_lines = lines;
00079    return result;
00080 }
00081 
00082 int list_line_count (code_list_t *cl)
00083 {
00084    int res = 0;
00085    char *cp = NULL;
00086 
00087    while (cl != NULL)
00088    {
00089       cp = cl->code;
00090       while (*cp != 0)
00091       {
00092          if (*cp == '\n' || cp == 0)
00093             res++;
00094          cp++;
00095       }
00096       cl = cl->next;
00097    }
00098    return res;
00099 }
00100 
00101 char next_char (void)
00102 {
00103    char c;
00104 
00105    /* printf ("next_char\n"); */
00106    c = *(codeptr);
00107    if (c != 0)
00108       codeptr++;
00109    if (c == 0)
00110    {
00111       if (clptr->next != NULL)
00112       {
00113          clptr = clptr->next;
00114          codeptr = clptr->code;
00115          c = *(codeptr);
00116          if (c != 0)
00117             codeptr++;
00118       }
00119       else
00120          return END_OF_LIST;
00121    }
00122    return c;
00123 }

00134 char main (int argc, char *argv [])
00135 {
00136    char **ca = NULL;
00137    FILE *fp = NULL, *ofp = NULL;
00138 
00139    if (argc == 1)
00140    {
00141       printf ("usage: %s [-r] [-b] filename\n", argv[0]);
00142       return 1;
00143    }
00144    get_opts (argc, argv);
00145    fp =  fopen (argv [argc - 1], "rt");
00146    if (fp != NULL)
00147    {
00148       code_lines = line_count (fp);
00149       rewind (fp);
00150       ca = file_read (fp);
00151       sr_call_count = count_sr (ca);
00152       if (optimize (ca) == 0)
00153       {
00154          ofp = fopen ("bgo.bat", "wt");
00155          if (ofp != NULL)
00156          {
00157             print_ca (ca, ofp);
00158             fclose (ofp);
00159             return 0;
00160          }
00161          else
00162             perror ("optimize, cannot open output file");
00163       }
00164    }
00165    return 1;
00166 }

00168 void get_opts (int argc, char*argv [])
00169 {
00170    int i;
00171 
00172    for (i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00173    {
00174       if (argv [i][0] == '-')
00175       {
00176          int j;
00177 
00178          for (j = 1; argv [i][j] != NULL; j++) 
00179          {
00180             switch (argv[i][j])
00181             {
00182                case 'r': remove_rems = 1;
00183                          break;
00184                case 'b': remove_blanks = 1;
00185                          break;
00186             }
00187          }
00188       }
00189    }
00190 }

00205 char get_labels (char **ca)

00211    /* printf ("get_labels\n");  */

00213    /*

00216    for (i = 0; i < sr_call_count && result == 0; i++)

00218       sprintf (text, END_SR_PFX"%i", i);

00233          lab_beg++;

00236       }

00238       {

00250          if (text != 0 && text[0] == ':' && strlen(text) > 1)
00251              result = install_ref (&text[1]);
00252          else
00253              result = 0; // was a call to another batch file, not call :label
00254       }
00255    }
00256    return result;

00258 
00259 char install_def (char *str)
00260 {
00261    int ln, i;
00262    label_detail_t *labptr;
00263 
00264    /* printf ("install_def\n");  */
00265    ln = find_label (str); 
00266    if (ln == -1)
00267    {
00268       if (num_labels >= max_labels)
00269       {
00270          labels = (label_detail_t *) \
00271                    realloc (labels, \
00272                      sizeof (label_detail_t) * (max_labels + label_incr));
00273          if (labels == NULL)
00274             return 1;
00275          for (i = max_labels; i < max_labels + label_incr; i++)
00276          {
00277             labels [i].label = NULL;
00278             labels [i].refd = 0;
00279             labels [i].defd = 0;
00280          }
00281          max_labels += label_incr;
00282       }
00283       labptr = labels + num_labels;
00284       labptr->label = (char *)realloc (labptr->label, 
00285                                       (strlen (str) + 1) * sizeof (char));
00286       strcpy (labptr->label, str);
00287       labptr->defd = 1;
00288       labptr->refd = 0;
00289       num_labels++;
00290    }
00291    else if (ln > num_labels - 1)
00292    {
00293       fprintf (stderr, "bad label no\n");
00294       return 1;
00295    }
00296    else
00297       (labels + ln)->defd = 1;
00298    return 0;
00299 }

00346 int find_label (char *str)
00347 {
00348    int result;
00349 
00350    /* printf ("find_label\n");  */
00351    for (result = 0; result < num_labels; result++)
00352    {
00353       if (strcmp (str, labels [result].label) == 0)
00354          return result;
00355    }
00356    return -1;
00357 }
00358 
00359 char optimize (char **ca)
00360 {
00361    int i;
00362    int changed = 1;
00363    int lcount = 0;
00364 
00365    if (get_labels (ca) != 0)
00366    {
00367       fprintf (stderr, "get_labels failed\n");
00368       return 1;
00369    }
00370 
00371    if (remove_blanks)
00372    {
00373       for (i = 0; i < code_lines; i++)
00374       {
00375          if (is_blank (ca [i]))
00376          {
00377             del_line (ca, i);
00378             /*i--;*/
00379          }
00380       }
00381    }
00382 
00383    if (remove_rems)
00384    {
00385       for (i = 0; i < code_lines; i++)
00386       {
00387          if (is_rem (ca [i]))
00388          {
00389             del_line (ca, i);
00390             i--;
00391          }
00392       }
00393    }
00394 
00395    while (changed)
00396    {
00397       changed = 0;
00398       // for each line in ca
00399       for (i = 0; i < code_lines && !changed; i++)
00400          changed += optimize_line(ca, i);
00401 
00402       for (i = 0; i < num_labels; i++)
00403       {
00404          if ((labels [i]).refd == 0)
00405             changed += del_unrefd_labs (labels[i].label, ca);
00406       }
00407 
00408       if (changed)
00409       {
00410          num_labels = 0;
00411          if (get_labels (ca) != 0)
00412          {
00413             fprintf (stderr, "get_labels failed\n");
00414             return 1;
00415          }
00416          if (check_labels () != 1)
00417          {
00418             fprintf (stderr, "optimize failed at pass %i\n", lcount);
00419             return 1;
00420          }
00421       }
00422       lcount++;
00423       /*
00424       sprintf (tempfile, "opt%i.bat", lcount);
00425       tmpfp = fopen (tempfile, "wt");
00426       print_ca (ca, tmpfp);
00427       fclose (tmpfp);
00428       */
00429    }
00430    return 0;
00431 }
00432 
00433 // return as soon as something has changed in 
00434 // attempt to get rid of bugs
00435 char optimize_line (char **ca, int line)
00436 {
00437     if (remove_blanks)
00438         if (is_blank (ca [line]))
00439         {
00440            del_line (ca, line);
00441            return 1;
00442         }
00443 
00444     if ((line + 1) < code_lines && is_uncond_br (ca [line]))
00445     {
00446         /* 
00447             we've got a goto followed by a line.
00448             delete the following line, unless
00449             it is a label, as it can 
00450             never be executed
00451         */
00452         char lab1 [TEXTLEN], lab2 [TEXTLEN];
00453         /* dead code elimination */
00454 
00455         if ((line + 1) < code_lines && !is_label (ca [line+1]))
00456         {
00457            del_line (ca, line + 1);
00458            return 1;
00459         }
00460 
00461         /* redundant goto ? */
00462         strcpy (lab1, get_label_ref (ca [line]));
00463         strcpy (lab2, get_label_def (ca [line+1]));
00464         if (strcmp (lab1, lab2) == 0)
00465         {
00466            del_line (ca, line);
00467            return 1;
00468         }
00469     }
00470     else if ((line + 2) < code_lines && is_cond_br (ca [line]) 
00471                                         && is_uncond_br (ca [line + 1]))
00472     {  
00473         /* eliminate jumps over jumps */
00474         if (is_label (ca [line+2]))
00475         {
00476            char lab1 [TEXTLEN], lab2 [TEXTLEN], lab3 [TEXTLEN];
00477 
00478            strcpy (lab1, get_label_ref (ca [line]));
00479            strcpy (lab2, get_label_ref (ca [line+1]));
00480            strcpy (lab3, get_label_def (ca [line+2]));
00481            if (strcmp (lab1, lab3) == 0)
00482            {
00483               char *lp, newline [TEXTLEN];
00484 
00485               lp = strstr (ca [line], "goto");
00486               *lp = 0;
00487               if (negate (& ca [line]) != 0)
00488               {
00489                  fprintf (stderr, "negate failed\n");
00490                  return 1;
00491               }
00492               sprintf (newline, "%s%s", ca [line], ca [line+1]);
00493               ca [line] = (char *)realloc (ca [line], \
00494                                 (strlen (newline) + 1) * sizeof (char));
00495               if (ca [line] == NULL)
00496               {
00497                  fprintf (stderr, "realloc failed in elim j over j\n");
00498                  return 1;
00499               }
00500               strcpy (ca[line], newline);
00501               del_line (ca, line + 1);
00502               return 1;
00503            }
00504         }
00505     }
00506     else if ((line + 2) < code_lines && is_cond_br (ca [line])
00507                    && is_label (ca [line + 2]) && !is_cond_br (ca[line+1]))
00508     {
00509         /* one line if */
00510         char lab1 [TEXTLEN], lab2 [TEXTLEN];
00511 
00512         strcpy (lab2, get_label_def (ca [line+2])); 
00513         strcpy (lab1, get_label_ref (ca [line]));
00514         if (strcmp (lab1, lab2) == 0)
00515         {
00516            char *lp, newline [TEXTLEN];
00517 
00518            lp = strstr (ca [line], "goto");
00519            *lp = 0;
00520            if (negate (& ca [line]) != 0)
00521            {
00522               fprintf (stderr, "negate failed\n");
00523               return 1;
00524            }
00525            sprintf (newline, "%s%s", ca [line], ca [line+1]);
00526            ca [line] = (char *)realloc (ca [line], \
00527                              (strlen (newline) + 1) * sizeof (char));
00528            if (ca [line] == NULL)
00529            {
00530               fprintf (stderr, "realloc failed in one line if\n");
00531               return 1;
00532            }
00533            strcpy (ca[line], newline);
00534            del_line (ca, line + 1);
00535              return 1;
00536         }
00537     }
00538     else if ((line + 1) < code_lines && is_label (ca [line]))
00539     {
00540         if (is_label (ca [line+1]))
00541         {
00542            /* eliminate duplicate labels */
00543 
00544            char lab1 [TEXTLEN], lab2 [TEXTLEN];
00545 
00546            strcpy (lab2, get_label_def (ca [line+1])); 
00547            strcpy (lab1, get_label_def (ca [line]));
00548            if (!(is_esr (lab1) || is_esr (lab2)))
00549            {
00550               if (reref_labs (ca, lab1, lab2) != 0)
00551                  return 1;
00552            }
00553         }
00554         else if (is_uncond_br (ca [line+1]))
00555         {
00556            /* jump to jump */
00557 
00558            char lab1 [TEXTLEN], lab2 [TEXTLEN];
00559 
00560            strcpy (lab2, get_label_ref (ca [line+1])); 
00561            strcpy (lab1, get_label_def (ca [line]));
00562            if (!(is_esr (lab1) || is_esr (lab2)))
00563            {
00564               if (reref_labs (ca, lab2, lab1) != 0)
00565                  return 1;
00566            }
00567         }            
00568     }
00569     return 0;
00570 }
00571 
00572 char del_unrefd_labs (char *name, char **ca)
00573 {
00574    int i;
00575    char result = 0;
00576    char text [TEXTLEN];
00577 
00578    /* printf ("del_unrefd_labs\n");  
00579    if (strstr(name, "batch_end") != NULL)
00580        return 0;
00581     */
00582 
00583    sprintf (text, ":%s", name);
00584    for (i = 0; i < code_lines; i++)
00585    {
00586       if (find_word (ca [i], text) != NULL && is_label (ca [i]))
00587       {
00588          del_line (ca, i);
00589          result = 1;
00590       }
00591    }
00592 
00593    return result;
00594 }

00601    for (i = 0; i < code_lines; i++)
00602    {
00603       if (ca [i] != NULL)                 
00604         fprintf (fp, "%s\n", ca [i]);

00607 
00608 char *find_word (char *str, char *word)
00609 {
00610    /* is word in string: return NULL or ptr to word in str */
00611    char *lp, c, done = 0;
00612 
00613    /* printf ("find_word\n");  */
00614    if (*str == '@')
00615       str++;
00616    while (!done)
00617    {
00618       lp = strstr (str, word);
00619       if (lp == NULL)
00620          return NULL;
00621       c = *(lp + strlen (word));
00622       if (
00623            (lp == str || isspace (*(lp - 1)))
00624            && (isspace (c) || c == 0)
00625          )
00626          /* return 1; */
00627          return lp;
00628       else if (lp != NULL)
00629       {
00630          str = lp+1;
00631          continue;
00632       }
00633       else
00634          done = 1;
00635    }
00636    return NULL;
00637 }
00638 
00639 char is_branch (char *str)
00640 {
00641    /* printf ("is_branch\n");  */
00642    if ((str = find_word (str, "goto")) != NULL)
00643    {
00644       str += 4;
00645       while (isspace (*str) && *str != 0)
00646          str++;
00647       if (*str != '%') /* exclude %_ret_label% */ /* why? can't remember. irrelevant now anyhow */
00648          return 1;
00649    }
00650    return 0;
00651 }
00652 
00653 char is_call (char *str)
00654 {
00655    /* printf ("is_call\n");  */
00656    if ((str = find_word (str, "call")) != NULL)
00657    {
00658       return 1;
00659    }
00660 
00661    return 0;
00662 }
00663 
00664 char is_rem (char *str)
00665 {
00666    /* printf ("is_rem\n");  */
00667    while (isspace (*str))
00668       str++;
00669    if (strstr (str, "rem") == str)
00670       return 1;
00671    return 0;
00672 }
00673 
00674 char is_blank (char *str)
00675 {
00676    /* printf ("is_blank\n");  */
00677    while (isspace (*str))
00678       str++;
00679    if (*str == 0)
00680       return 1;
00681    return 0;
00682 }
00683 
00684 char is_uncond_br (char *str)
00685 {
00686    /* printf ("is_uncond_br\n"); */
00687    if (is_branch (str) && (find_word (str, "if") == NULL))
00688       return 1;
00689    return 0;
00690 }
00691 
00692 char is_cond_br (char *str)
00693 {
00694    /* printf ("is_cond_br\n"); */
00695    /* if (is_branch (str) && (find_word (str, "if") != NULL)) */
00696    /* if 1st word is if it's a conditional branch */
00697    /*
00698    while (isspace (*str))
00699       str++;
00700    if (str == find_word (str, "if"))
00701       return 1;
00702    */
00703    /* if 1st word is if and there's a goto 
00704       it's a conditional branch */
00705    if (is_branch (str))
00706    {
00707        while (isspace (*str))
00708           str++;
00709        if (str == find_word (str, "if"))
00710           return 1;
00711    }
00712    return 0;
00713 }
00714 
00715 char is_label (char *str)
00716 {
00717    /* printf ("is_label\n");  */
00718    while (isspace (*str))
00719       str++;
00720    if (*str == ':')
00721       return 1;
00722    return 0;
00723 }
00724 
00725 void del_line (char **ca, int line_no)
00726 {
00727    int i = 0;
00728 
00729    /* printf ("del_line\n");  */
00730    /* free (ca [line_no]); */
00731    /* if (strstr(ca[line_no], ":batch_end") != NULL)
00732        return; */
00733 
00734    for (i = line_no; i < code_lines; i++)
00735       ca [i] = ca [i+1];
00736    code_lines--;
00737 }
00738 
00739 char *get_label_def (char *str)
00740 {
00741    static char label [TEXTLEN];
00742    char *lp;
00743 
00744    /* printf ("get_label_def\n");  */
00745    lp = strchr (str, ':');
00746    lp++;
00747    sscanf (lp, "%s", label);
00748    return &label [0];
00749 }
00750 
00751 char *get_label_ref (char *str)
00752 {
00753    static char label [TEXTLEN];
00754    char *lp;
00755 
00756    /* printf ("get_label_ref\n");  */
00757    lp = strstr (str, "goto");
00758    lp+=4;
00759    sscanf (lp, "%s", label);
00760    return &label [0];
00761 }
00762 
00763 char negate (char **str)
00764 {
00765    char text [TEXTLEN];
00766    char *lp;
00767 
00768    /* printf ("negate\n");  */
00769    if ((lp = strstr (*str, "not")) == NULL)
00770    {
00771       lp = strstr (*str, "if");
00772       lp += 2;
00773       /* *(lp - 1) = NULL; */
00774       sprintf (text, "%s%s", "if not", lp);
00775    }
00776    else
00777    { 
00778       lp+=3;
00779       sprintf (text, "%s%s", "if", lp);
00780    }
00781    *str = (char *) realloc (*str, sizeof (char) * (strlen (text) + 1));
00782    if (*str == NULL)
00783       return 1;
00784    strcpy (*str, text);
00785    return 0;
00786 }
00787 
00788 char reref_labs (char **ca, char *newlab, char *oldlab)
00789 {
00790    int i;
00791    char *lp;
00792    char text [TEXTLEN];
00793 
00794    /* change references to oldlab to references to newlab */
00795 
00796    /* printf ("reref_labs\n");  */
00797    if (newlab == NULL || oldlab == NULL)
00798       return 1;
00799    for (i = 0; i < code_lines; i++)
00800    {
00801       if ((lp = find_word (ca[i], oldlab)) != NULL && is_branch (ca [i]))
00802       {
00803          *lp = 0;
00804          sprintf (text, "%s%s", ca [i], newlab);
00805          ca [i] = (char *)realloc (ca [i], \
00806                                       sizeof (char) * (strlen (text) + 1));
00807          if (ca [i] == NULL)
00808          {
00809             fprintf (stderr, "reref failed\n");
00810             return 1;
00811          }
00812          strcpy (ca [i], text);
00813       }
00814    }
00815    if ((i = find_label (newlab)) != -1)
00816       (labels [i]).refd = 1;
00817    if ((i = find_label (oldlab)) != -1)
00818       (labels [i]).refd = 0;
00819    return 0;
00820 }
00821 
00822 char check_labels (void)
00823 {
00824    int i;
00825    char result = 1;
00826 
00827    for (i = 0; i < max_labels; i++)
00828    {
00829       if (labels[i].refd == 1 && labels[i].defd == 0)
00830       {
00831          fprintf (stderr, "label %s referenced but not defined\n", labels[i].label);
00832          result = 0;
00833       }
00834    }
00835    return result;
00836 }
00837 
00838 int cn_count (code_list_t *code)
00839 {
00840    int result = 0;
00841 
00842    while (code != NULL)
00843    {
00844       result++;
00845       code = code->next;
00846    }
00847 
00848    return result;
00849 }
00850 
00851 char is_esr (char *lab)
00852 {
00853    if (strcmp(lab, ":eof") == 0)
00854        return 1;
00855 
00856    if (strstr (lab, END_SR_PFX) == NULL)
00857       return 0;
00858 
00859    return 1;
00860 }
